scripts.docker:build: docker build -t evc -f ./devops/Dockerfile --memory-swap -1 --memory 4g --build-arg NODE_ENV=prod --build-arg REACT_APP_GIT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) .
scripts.docker:push: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 115607939215.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com; docker tag evc:latest 115607939215.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/evc:latest; docker push 115607939215.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/evc:latest
scripts.ecs:update: aws ecs update-service --cluster evc-cluster --service evc-portal --force-new-deployment  --region us-east-1
scripts.release: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push && npm run ecs:update
